# tonal-encoding [![npm version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/tonal-encoding.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/tonal-encoding)

[![tonal](https://img.shields.io/badge/tonal-encoding-yellow.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/browse/keyword/tonal)

Encode pitches using fifths/octaves. This encoding is very usefull to perform arithmetic operations as addition (transpose) or substraction (distance)

This is part of [tonal](https://www.npmjs.com/package/tonal) music theory library.

You can install via npm: `npm i --save tonal-encoding`
